alert.note: Alert for Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 02 at 1:58AM MST until December 02 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...The Rapid City area and the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills. * WHEN...From 7 AM MST /8 AM CST/ to 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Rapid City; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
